CREATE TABLE application.iteration( id bigserial NOT NULL, name character varying NOT NULL, descr character varying NULL, date_start date, date_end date, iteration_num numeric NOT NULL, -- номер итерации в проекте
user_id bigint, added timestamp NULL, modified timestamp NULL, del boolean default false, done boolean default false,
CONSTRAINT iteration_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT iteration_user_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
